Hey guys, I'm getting the standard crash once past dev video thing ("can't get back buffer") and I know it's due to my screen resolution. My comp. is configured at 1680 * 1080, and I also know that in mydocuments/mygames/Menofwarcondemnedheroes is a file called 'settings.set' which allows me to force the game into booting with another resolution.

The problem? Every res I enter gives me an input error because it doesn't recognise how I formatted it (E.g. "1680x1050" doesn't work). Can't find any help for this online, and the problem's been around since Assualt Squad at least
yw1, try reinstalling your video driver (removing it completely then installing again, latest drivers btw) because the game works on quite old ati/amd, nvidia and even intel cards.

you guys calling the virus a false positive are the true idiots.  You're so used to these "false positives" from cracks that when you come across one you don't bother to look into more to keep yourself safe.  That's why you retards have your shit fucked!  the skidrow.dll injects another file called obfuscator.xz into your win32 folder.  No game ever needs to do that.  Grab the reloaded crack and bypass this one.  We don't even know if the crack really belongs to skidrow because previous dlls from skiddy never has this issue in their false positive.
